statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -20 \\ 0 \\ -14 \\ -6 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 30 \\ 8 \\ 13 \\ 21 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -20 \\ 0 \\ -14 \\ -6 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 30 \\ 8 \\ 13 \\ 21 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
